targets.expr:
sum by(instance, device) (
  label_replace(
    rate(
      node_disk_written_bytes_total{cluster="ops-gitlab-gke"}[$__rate_interval]
    ),
    "instance",
    "$1",
    "instance",
    "([^:]+)(:[0-9]+)?"
  )
)
+
ignoring(pod) group_right() (
  label_replace(
    label_replace(
      count by(
        instance,
        pod,
        device
      )
      (
        container_fs_writes_bytes_total{
          cluster=~"ops-gitlab-gke", namespace=~"$namespace",
          container=~"store-gateway",
          device!~".*sda.*"
        }
      ),
      "device",
      "$1",
      "device",
      "/dev/(.*)"
    ),
    "instance",
    "$1",
    "instance",
    "([^:]+)(:[0-9]+)?"
  ) * 0
)

sum by(instance, device) (
  label_replace(
    rate(
      node_disk_read_bytes_total{cluster="ops-gitlab-gke"}[$__rate_interval]
    ),
    "instance",
    "$1",
    "instance",
    "([^:]+)(:[0-9]+)?"
  )
) + ignoring(pod) group_right() (
  label_replace(
    label_replace(
      count by(
        instance,
        pod,
        device
      )
      (
        container_fs_writes_bytes_total{
          cluster=~"ops-gitlab-gke", namespace=~"$namespace",
          container=~"store-gateway",
          device!~".*sda.*"
        }
      ),
      "device",
      "$1",
      "device",
      "/dev/(.*)"
    ),
    "instance",
    "$1",
    "instance",
    "([^:]+)(:[0-9]+)?"
  ) * 0
)
